caption.title: Context-specific FRR vs. ODn threshold in three demonstrative surveillance scenarios (assuming perfect ARV exposure testing).
caption.p: A: Scenario similar to South African epidemic. B: Scenario similar to Kenyan epidemic. C: Concentrated epidemic scenario. A supplementary viral load threshold of >1,000c/mL is used throughout. We assume ARV exposure testing classifies all treated individuals as long-term.
Click here for additional data file.
